content.html: It was Plex. They exploited Plex to get into the home network, installed a keylogger on a home laptop, and got the corp vault password because the home laptop was logging into it. Targeted high value employee shortly after the arstechnica.com/information-te…… twitter.com/i/web/status/1…
content.value:
It was Plex. They exploited Plex to get into the home network, installed a keylogger on a home laptop, and got the corp vault password because the home laptop was logging into it.

Targeted high value employee shortly after the arstechnica.com/information-te…… twitter.com/i/web/status/1…
